search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Urlooker (urlooker.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for the pricing page of Urlooker is: [https://urlooker.com/pricing](https://urlooker.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
### Standard

$9 Per Month

* * *

*   **10** Pages to Track
*   **4** Checks per Day (for each Page)

Will save you **6.5** hours of manual work per month

[Sign Up](https://urlooker.com/auth/signup)

### Premium

$20 Per Month

* * *

*   **25** Pages to Track
*   **24** Checks per Day (for each Page)

Will save you **100** hours of manual work per month

[Sign Up](https://urlooker.com/auth/signup)

### Professional

$50 Per Month

* * *

*   **100** Pages to Track
*   **48** Checks per Day (for each Page)
*   Checks every 30 minutes

Will save you **800** hours of manual work per month

[Sign Up](https://urlooker.com/auth/signup)

##### Can I Try It For Free?

Yes, after signing up you will get a Free plan which allows you to monitor up to 2 pages, once per day.

##### What is Page?

Page is a single URL which you want to monitor; each page may also include page area and keywords filters.

##### What is Checks per Day?

It is the limit of how frequently we'll check the selected page for changes.

##### Can I Select a Specific Time Period to Monitor?

Sure, you can either select a period (for example from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM) or exact time of checks (i.e., check on 10:30 AM and 2:00 PM).

##### What Will Happen if I Change Plan?

If you downgrade your plan, you'll stay on your current plan until the end of billing period. If you upgrade your plan, you'll be upgraded immediately, with proration of unused days on current period.

##### Can I Monitor More Than 100 Pages?

Contact us at [support@urlooker.com](mailto:support@urlooker.com) or using live chat to discuss it.

Our pricing for Free, Standard and Premium plans.
Try our Free plan - monitor any 2 pages every day free of charge!

pricing_data.pricing_notes: The Free plan allows monitoring of up to 2 pages daily without charge.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Standard plan for moderate monitoring needs.
